entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary: Hi :) We, the students of Section - A MBA batch of the Institute of Engineering & Management, Kolkata (2022-2024), are starting our own blog to spread different kinds of awareness among the community. Our Socials: We hope you will enjoy your stay. Stay tuned…
entry.content:
Hi :)

We, the students of Section - A MBA batch of the Institute of Engineering & Management, Kolkata (2022-2024), are starting our own blog to spread different kinds of awareness among the community.

Our Socials:

  • Youtube - https://bit.ly/just5minsyt
  • Instagram - @just5mins2224
  • Twitter - @just5mins_in
  • Podcast - Coming Soon


We hope you will enjoy your stay. Stay tuned for more.
